name: 4343: The Battle of the Milky Way
name_original: 4343: The Battle of the Milky Way
description:
Power ups and gameplay (and possibly the title) inspired by 1943: The Battle of Midway

Modernizing the old arcade shooter with a host of alternate fly-able ships and upgrades

There's even a cutscene at the end :D

WASD - Move ship

Space - Use ship ability

LMB - Fire weapon
